archimate:BusinessProcess.name: SUP.1.BP3 Assure quality of process activities
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Perform the activities according to the quality assurance strategy and the project schedule to ensure that the processes meet their defined goals and document the results. NOTE 7: Relevant process goals may include goals from applicable standards. NOTE 8: Problems detected in the process definition or implementation may be entered into a process improvement process (PIM.3) to describe, record, analyze, resolve, track to closure and prevent the problems.
